summary: I RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE 14V-271. IT REQUIRES AN INLINE FUSE TO PREVENT POSSIBLE FIRES. IT DOES NOT ADDRESS THE ISSUE WHICH IS WATER GETTING INTO THE FRONT AND REAR CLEARANCE LIGHTS AND CAUSING THEM TO BECOME INOPERATIVE. WHICH MEANS THE VEHICLE WILL BE WITHOUT THE AFFECTIVE LIGHTS DURING OPERATION.   THE FAILURE IS ALMOST UNIVERSALLY SURE TO OCCUR....     SUGGEST THAT THE MANUFACTURE REPLACE THE LIGHTS TO ASSURE COMPLIANCE WITH FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL LAWS.  *TR
